item.title: Firewall
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Firewall ChatGPT answer: What is a firewall and how does it work to protect a network? What are the different types and levels of firewall security available? How does a firewall handle incoming and outgoing network traffic? What are some common techniques used by attackers to bypass a firewall and how can they be prevented? Can a firewall alone provide complete protection for a network, or is additional security measures required?

item.title: Intrusion Detection and Prevention Systems (IDPS)

What are some limitations or challenges with implementing and maintaining an IDPS?
